lead_paragraph: KRAUSKOPF--John. Died February 3, 2016 after long struggle with Parkinson's. Beloved husband and best friend of Sharon Greene, loving father of David Krauskopf-Greene, Jill, Lynn and Sara. Greatly respected scientist, colleague, mentor and friend to so many around the world. We will miss him terribly. 1/3
